alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:19PM PDT until June 15 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Inyo County in south central California... * Until 1100 PM PDT. * At 1017 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Panamint Springs, or 24 miles southwest of Stovepipe Wells, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will affect portions of Death Valley National Park including the Panamint Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
